Bisnis Perjalanan Wisata Dinilai Cukup Menjanjikan di Aceh Tengah
06 Nov 2019, 16:56 by Fitra Jayadi


Bisnis Perjalanan Wisata Dinilai Cukup Menjanjikan di Aceh Tengah

KBRN,Takengon : Seiring dengan berkembangnya sektor pariwisata di Kabupaten Aceh Tengah keberadaan travel agent atau agen perjalanan wisata merupakan salah satu bisnis yang sangat menjanjikan untuk dikembangkan.
Kepala Dinas Pariwisata, Kepemudaan dan Olahraga (Disparpora) Aceh Tengah Jumadil Enka mengatakan, selam ini mulai banyak wisatawan yang hadir ke daerah itu dengan memanfaatkan keberadaan agen perjalanan wisata.
Hanya saja dirinya cukup menyayangkan, belum tersedianya agen perjalanan wisata milik masyarakat lokal membuat banyak dari mereka harus menggunakan jasa biro perjalanan dari luar daerah termasuk dari Sumatera Utara.
“Tingkat kunjungan saat ini cukup baik, ada yang datang sendiri, sebagian lagi sudah menggunakan travel agent, jadi mudah-mudahan ke depan, ada agen perjalanan wisata yang kantornya di Aceh Tengah, pemiliknya juga masyarakat Aceh Tengah, bukan lagi perwakilan,” harapnya, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Kadisparpora Aceh Tengah Jumadil Enkja menambahkan, keberadaan biro perjalanan wisata yang menawarkan kunjungan ke sejumlah objek-objek menarik menjadi salah satu bagian dalam menukung perkembangan sektor pariwisata.
Karena menurutnya, akan memberi kemudahan bagi para wisatawan mengingat terdapat beberapa objek wisata yang letaknya agak jauh dari pusat kota Takengon serta belum didukung transportasi umum yang memadai.(FJ)

Business Travel Tourism is considered quite promising in Central Aceh
Nov 6, 2019, 16:56 by Fitra Jayadi


Business Travel Tourism is considered quite promising in Central Aceh

KBRN, Takengon: Along with the development of the tourism sector in Central Aceh Regency, the existence of travel agents is one of the very promising businesses to be developed.
Head of the Central Aceh Tourism, Youth and Sports Office (Disparpora) Jumadil Enka said, during this dive many tourists were coming to the area by utilizing the presence of travel agents.
It's just that he was quite lamented, the unavailability of travel agents owned by local communities made many of them have to use the services of travel agents from outside the region including from North Sumatra.
"The current level of visits is quite good, some come in person, some have used travel agents, so hopefully in the future, there will be a travel agent whose office is in Central Aceh, the owner is also the people of Central Aceh, no longer representative," he hoped, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Kadisparpora Aceh Tengah Jumadil Enkja added, the existence of a travel agency that offers visits to a number of interesting objects is one part in supporting the development of the tourism sector.
Because according to him, it will provide convenience for tourists considering that there are several attractions that are located some distance from the center of the city of Takengon and are not yet supported by adequate public transportation. (FJ)
